title.native: 異世界ゆるり紀行 ～子育てしながら冒険者します～
title.romaji: Isekai Yururi Kikou: Kosodate Shinagara Boukensha Shimasu
title.english: A Journey Through Another World: Raising Kids While Adventuring

description:
After a god accidentally slays him, Takumi’s reborn with new skills in a monster-filled forest where he stumbles upon twins. They’re sweet, adorable, and super strong! Won over instantly, he names them Alan and Elena, becomes their guardian, and joins an adventurers’ guild to provide for his new family. And so starts his chill life of adventure, watching over Alan and Elena’s growth!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Mermaid
tags.description: A mythological creature with the body of a human and the tail of a fish.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

node.description:
__Birthplace:__ Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan
__Daughter:__ [Ryouko Maekawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120430)

__Atsushi Maekawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter for anime, while he also occasionally writes lyrics for music.
Akinari Suzuki is a composer and arranger.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
Audio and ADR Engineer affiliated with Crunchyroll
Samantha Herek is a producer and actress.
Matheus Périssé is a brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, singer, presenter and youtuber.
_Note: Not to be confused with late Kyoto Animation Animator [Sayaka Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/158705/Sayaka-Watanabe)._
